infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: GQ Cars needs location access to provide accurate pickup and destination services.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: GQ Cars needs location access to track your ride and provide real-time updates.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: GQ Cars needs camera access to capture profile photos and documents.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: GQ Cars needs microphone access for voice commands and emergency calls.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: GQ Cars uses Face ID for secure authentication.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: GQ Cars needs contacts access to quickly add emergency contacts.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow GQ Cars to access your camera for profile photos and documents.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow GQ Cars to access your photos to save receipts and documents.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow GQ Cars to save receipts and trip photos to your gallery.
